News_Titles: On the meeting with the representatives of the ICRC mission in Abkhazia
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs received the representatives of the ICRC mission in the Republic of Abkhazia at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia on May 5, 2021.

News_Titles: On the meeting of Daur Kove with Mikhail Bogdanov
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Mikhail Bogdanov, the Special Representative of the President of the Russian Federation for the Middle East and Africa, the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation on April 2, 2021.

News_Titles: On Daur Kove's meeting with Dmitry Medoev
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia had a meeting with Dmitry Medoev, the acting Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Daur Kove received Jawad Rahman Shehriya, President of «BACP” association on the promotion of business relations with Pakistan
News_Shorts: On January 28, Daur Kove, the Foreign Minister of Abkhazia held a meeting with Jawad Rahman, the President of "BACP", President of the International NGO "Land of Pakistanis in Russia" and Deputy Chairman of the "Business Council on Cooperation with Pakistan"

News_Titles: On the meeting of Daur Kove with Hussein Arnous
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Hussein Arnous, the Prime Minister of the Syrian Arab Republic. The meeting was held at the Cabinet of Ministers of the Syrian Arab Republic.

News_Titles: On the meeting of Daur Kove with Toivo Klaar, the EU Special Representative for the South Caucasus.
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Abkhaz Foreign Minister met with Toivo Klaar, the EU Special Representative for the South Caucasus on October 13,2020. The meeting was also attended by Björn Kuehne, the Political Adviser of the European Union Special Representative for the South Caucasus, Emmanuel Anketil, the Political Adviser in the office of the European Union Special Representative for the South Caucasus as well as Gottfried Hanne, the OSCE Political Adviser.

News_Titles: Daur Kove and Dmitry Medoev signed a consultation plan for 2021-2022
News_Shorts: On September 29, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove met with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia Dmitry Medoev, who arrived in Abkhazia on a working visit.

News_Titles: Daur Kove hosted a meeting with Garry Kupalba
News_Shorts: On August 19 Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia hosted a meeting with Garry Kupalba, the Head of the Official Representation of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic in the Republic of Abkhazia in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia

News_Titles: On the meeting at the Ministry of Health of Russia
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Igor Kagramanyan, the First Deputy Minister of Health of the Russian Federation at the Ministry of Health of Russia on July 20,2020.

News_Titles: On the meeting of Daur Kove with the Chairman of the Moscow City Duma Alexey Shaposhnikov
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Abkhaz Foreign Minister, Igor Akhba, the Ambassador of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation and Renat Karchaa, the Assistant to the President of the Republic of Abkhazia for Strategic Communications met with Alexey Shaposhnikov, the Chairman of the Moscow City Duma on July 16, in Moscow.

News_Titles: Oleg Botsiev conveyed to the head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia an appeal from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia to the governments of foreign states on the occasion of the 100th anniversary of the Ossetian
News_Shorts: Oleg Botsiev conveyed an Appeal to the governments of foreign states in connection with the 100-th anniversary of the Ossetian genocide from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia to the Head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia

News_Titles: Daur Cove held a meeting with Louise Winton
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia held a meeting with Louise Winton, the UNDP Resident Representative on April 17,2020.

News_Titles: Daur Kove congratulated Sergey Lavrov on the occasion of his anniversary
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia congratulated Sergey Lavrov, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation on the occasion of his 70-th birthday.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with the representatives of the World Health Organization
News_Shorts: Daur Kove expressed concern on the current situation in the world related to the spread of coronavirus infection and also expressed hope for an early resolution of the problem.

News_Titles: Daur Kove congratulated Alexey Dvinyanin on the occasion of his birthday
News_Shorts: ﻿Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia congratulated Alexei Dvinyanin, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation to the Republic of Abkhazia on the occasion of his birthday.

News_Titles: On the meeting with the representatives of the international non-governmental organizations
News_Shorts: The meeting of Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with the representatives of the international non-governmental organizations which carries out the activities in the territory of the Republic of Abkhazia was held at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia on March 3,2020.

News_Titles: On the meeting of Daur Kove with A. Rudenko, the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation
News_Shorts: The meeting of Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with Andrey Rudenko, the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation was held at the Russian Foreign Ministry on January 21,2020.

News_Titles: Alexey Dvinyanin introduced the new Adviser-Envoy of the Embassy of the Russian Federation to the Republic of Abkhazia
News_Shorts: Alexey Dvinyanin, the Ambassador of the Russian Federation to the Republic of Abkhazia introduced to Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs Maxim Litvinov, the new Adviser-Envoy of the Embassy of the Russian Federation to the Republic of Abkhazia at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia on January 15,2019.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Andrey Rudenko
News_Shorts: The meeting of Daur Kove, the the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with Andrey Rudenko, the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation was held at the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs on December 5, 2019.

News_Titles: The Abkhaz-Austrian Society established the "Commission for the Support of International Contacts of the Republic of Abkhazia"
News_Shorts: The Abkhaz-Austrian Society established the “Commission for the Support of International Contacts of the Republic of Abkhazia” on December 3, 2019. The commission is headed by the General Committee of the Abkhaz-Austrian Society.  The main objective of the Abkhaz-Austrian Society is to promote the dialogue between Abkhazia and Austria in the field of cultural and humanitarian cooperation as well as the development of international contacts of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: On the meeting with the delegation from China
News_Shorts: The meeting of Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and the Delegation from the People's Republic of China was held at the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia on November 12,2019. The delegation includes: Liu Ya Jun, the Vice - Chairman of the China-Asia Economic Development Association and Long WeiBo, the Director of the ShanXi Office, the Senior Engineer of China Unicom. The meeting was also attended by Dzhansukh Nanba, the Vice Prime Minister, Minister of Finance of the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Daur Kove held a meeting with Patrick Poppel
News_Shorts: The meeting between Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and Patrick Poppel, the Head of the Abkhaz-Austrian Society was held at the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia on November 11,2019.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with the representatives of the ICRC Mission in the Republic of Abkhazia
News_Shorts: The meeting between Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and the representatives of the ICRC Mission in the Republic of Abkhazia was held at the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia on November 8,2019.

News_Titles: On the meeting with the Project Manager of the United Nations Development Program
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Abkhaz Foreign Minister met with Federica Dispenza, the Project Manager of the United Nations Development Program (UNDP) on November 7,2019. The meeting was also attended by Simon Agrba, the Project Specialist in the framework of the UNDP and Arthur Gaguliya, the Head of the Department of interaction with international organizations of the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Daur Kove gave an interview to Walter Mayr, the correspondent of «Der Spiegel» magazine
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs gave an interview to Walter Mayr, the correspondent of the German «Der Spiegel» magazine at the Abkhazian Foreign Ministry on November 4, 2019.

News_Titles: Daur Kove held a meeting with Alexander Vataman
News_Shorts: The meeting between Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and Alexander Vataman, the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Transdniestrian Moldavian Republic was held at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia on November 4, 2019.

News_Titles: On the meeting at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PMR
News_Shorts: The meeting of A.P. Stetsyuk, the Acting Minister of the PMR Foreign Minister with A.V. Vataman, the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in PMR was held at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PMR on September 27, 2019.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Wolfgang Matzke, the official representative of the CCI of the Republic of Abkhazia in Germany
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Wolfgang Matzke, the official representative of the Chamber of Commerce and Industry of the Republic of Abkhazia in Germany as well as with David Noack, the journalist from such German publications as: «Junge Welt», «German Foreign Policy», «Neues Deutschland» on October 1,2019.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Andrei Rudenko
News_Shorts: The meeting of Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with Andrei Rudenko, the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation was held on Monday, September 30,2019.

News_Titles: On the meeting at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PMR
News_Shorts: The meeting of A.P. Stetsyuk, the Acting Minister of the PMR Foreign Minister with A.V. Vataman, the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in PMR was held at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PMR on September 27, 2019.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Anatoly Bibilov
News_Shorts: The meeting of Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with Anatoly Bibilov, the President of the Republic of South Ossetia was held in Tskhinval on September 21,2019.

News_Titles: Alba Azucena Torres Mejia was appointed as the Ambassador of the Republic of Nicaragua to the Republic of Abkhazia
News_Shorts: The ceremony of presenting copies of credentials of Alba Azucena Torres Mejia, the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Nicaragua to the Republic of Abkhazia to Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia was held at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia on August 23,2019.

News_Titles: The Foreign Minister of Abkhazia met with representatives of international organizations
News_Shorts: On July 29, Daur Kove, Foreign Minister met with representatives of international organizations working in the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Daur Kove congratulated Masis Mayilyan on the foundation day of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Artsakh
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia congratulated Masis Mayilian on the occasion of the foundation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

News_Titles: Meeting with UNHCR and DRC representatives
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Ardzun Shresth, the head of the UNHCR office in Abkhazia and Blerim Muhaksheri, the head of the Danish Refugee Council in Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Meeting with UN Permanent Coordinator Louise Vinton
News_Shorts: On April 24, Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia, met with the UN Permanent Coordinator, UNDP Permanent Representative Louise Vinton and Peace and Oleg Protsik, Development Adviser in the South Caucasus.

News_Titles: The meeting was held between the heads of the Foreign Ministries of Abkhazia and Russia
News_Shorts: The meeting of Kove D.V. and Lavrov S.V., the Ministers of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia and the Russian Federation was held on April 1,2019.

News_Titles: The Abkhaz Foreign Minister had received the UNHCR representatives
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs met with a the UNHCR delegation at the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia on March 27,2019. The delegation includes Pascal Moreau, the Director of the European Bureau, UNHCR; Francois Renault, the head of the European Bureau of the UNHCR; Johannes Van der Klaauw, the regional representative of the UNHCR in the South Caucasus; Yoko Akasaka, the deputy regional representative of the UNHCR in the South Caucasus.

News_Titles: Daur Kove took part in the plenary session of the Russian Investment Forum 2019 in Sochi
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Foreign Minister took part in the plenary session of the 2019 Russian Investment Forum "Success Factors: Ideas, Personnel, Competences" as the part of the delegation of the Republic of Abkhazia headed by Jansukh Nanba, the Deputy Prime Minister and Finance Minister which was held in Sochi on February 14,2019.

News_Titles: On the meeting of Daur Kove with Harry Kupalba
News_Shorts: The meeting of Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with Harry Kupalba, the Head of the Official Representative Office of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic in the Republic of Abkhazia took place on December 25,2018.

News_Titles: On the meeting of Daur Kove with Ryu Hyon Chol, the President of the DPRK Chamber of Commerce
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Foreign Minister met with Ryu Hyon Chol, the President of the DPRK Chamber of Commerce of the Republic of South Korea at the Abkhaz Foreign Ministry on November 28,2018.

News_Titles: On the meeting of Daura Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with Dmitry Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Foreign Minister of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Dmitry Medoev, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of South Ossetia at the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia on October 3, 2018. The meeting was also attended by Vissarion Aplia, the head of the Abkhaz Orthodox Church.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Vladimir Nekrasov, the Trade Representative of Russia in Abkhazia.
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Vladimir Nekrasov, the Trade Representative of the Russian Federation in the Republic of Abkhazia in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: On a meeting with Niels Scott
News_Shorts: The meeting between Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia and Niels Scott, the Permanent Coordinator of the United Nations Development Program (UNDP) was held at the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia on February 27,2018.

News_Titles: On the meeting with Nilson Scott
News_Shorts: The meeting of Daur Kove , the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with Nilson Scott, the Permanent Coordinator of the United Nations Development Program (UNDP) was held on December 1,2017.

News_Titles: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs met the President of Nauru on the Abkhaz-Russian border.
News_Shorts: Baron Divavesi Waqa, the President of Nauru arrived at Abkhazia on a working visit on 12 November.

News_Titles: On the meeting of Daur Kove with Nicolas Dupont-Enjanom, the Deputy of the National Assembly of France.
News_Shorts: The meeting between Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with Nicolas Dupont-Enjanom, the Deputy of the National Assembly of France, leader of the party "Get up, France" hosted in the building of the National Assembly of France, Paris on 17 October, 2017.

News_Titles: On the meeting with Johannes van der Klaauw, the regional representative of the UNHCR UN in the south Caucasus.
News_Shorts: On the meeting with Johannes van der Klaauw, the regional representative of the UNHCR UN in the South Caucasus. The meeting of Daur Kove, the Minister for the Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with Johannes van der Klaaw, the regional representative of the UNHCR UN in the South Caucasus was held on 20 October.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Garry Kupalba.
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Garry Kupalba, the Official Representative of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Nils Scott, the Permanent Coordinator of the United Nations Development Program (UNDP)
News_Shorts: Daur Kove met with Niels Scott, the permanent coordinator of the United Nations Development Program (UNDP) in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia today. The meeting was also attended by Georgi Dumava, the Assistant of Foreign Minister of Abkhazia, Artur Gagulia, the Head of the Department for Interaction with International Organizations as well as Kurtmolla Abdulganiev, the Head of UNDP Program Office in the Republic of Abkhazia and Ann Sophie Hellgren, the Special Assistant to the UN Resident Coordinator.

News_Titles: On the meeting with the delegation of the non-governmental organization "Kuban" from Jordan.
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met with the delegation of the non-governmental organization "Kuban" from Jordan in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Johannes van der Klaauw
News_Shorts: On March 20, the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia hosted a meeting between the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove and the UNHCR regional representative in the South Caucasus, Johannes van der Klaauw. The meeting was also attended by the Deputy Foreign Minister Kan Taniya, head of the Department for interaction with International organizations Arthur Gagulia and head of the UNHCR Office in Abkhazia Aziz Rahjo.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met Vladimir Avidzba and Inar Gitsba
News_Shorts: On the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of the Plenipotentiary Representative office of the Republic of Abkhazia in the Republic of Turkey, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia invited the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Abkhazia, the first Plenipotentiary representative of the Republic of Abkhazia in Turkish Republic Vladimir Avidzba, as well as the current Plenipotentiary representative of Abkhazia in Turkey Inar Gitsba.

News_Titles: On the meeting with the Anti Turunen and Hailu Mamo
News_Shorts: The Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove met with Co-chairman of the Geneva discussions from the UN Anti Turunen and Senior Political Adviser to the UN Special Representative to the Geneva discussions Hailu Mamo. The meeting was also attended by the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs Kan Tania.

News_Titles: On February 15 at the Permanent Representative office of the Republic of Abkhazia in Germany was held a round table "Abkhazia and Europe: rapprochement", organized by the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia Khibla Amichba with the p
News_Shorts: On February 15 at the Permanent Representative office of the Republic of Abkhazia in Germany was held a round table "Abkhazia and Europe: rapprochement", organized by the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Republic of Abkhazia Khibla Amichba with the participation of deputy of the German Bundestag Christian Haase (CDU party).

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with the Deputy Foreign Minister of Russia Grigory Karasin
News_Shorts: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation hosted a meeting between the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove and the State Secretary, Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation Grigory Karasin.

News_Titles: Daur Kove held a meeting with the Ambassador of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation Igor Akhba
News_Shorts: During a working visit to Moscow, the Foreign Minister Daur Kove visited the Embassy of the Republic of Abkhazia to the Russian Federation.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with the UNHCR Regional Representative for the South Caucasus, Johannes van der Klaauw
News_Shorts: On 25 January, the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia hosted a meeting between the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove and the UNHCR Regional Representative for the South Caucasus, Johannes Van Der Klaauw. The meeting was also attended by the Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Kan Tania, head of the Department for Interaction with International Organizations Artur Gaguliya and head of the UNHCR office in Abkhazia Aziz Rahdzho.

News_Titles: Daur Kove attended the opening of the photo exhibition "Orthodox Abkhazia"
News_Shorts: At the Sukhum Theological School at the Cathedral was held the opening of the photo exhibition "Orthodox Abkhazia". The exhibition was organized by the Abkhazian Orthodox Church Foundation, St. John Chrysostom and information photo agency "Abhazpress ART".

News_Titles: The Foreign Minister of Abkhazia Daur Kove held a meeting with representatives of the Council of Young Diplomats
News_Shorts: The event was attended by the Chairman of the Board - desk officer at the Department of Europe, the United States and Canada of the MFA of Abkhazia Astanda Pataraya, Vice-Chairmen - desk officers at the Department of Latin America, Asia, Africa and the Asia-Pacific of the MFA of Abkhazia Inar Ladariya and Victoria Malania.

News_Titles: International Roundtable "Close and distant Syria"
News_Shorts: International Roundtable " Close and distant Syria" was organized by the Center for Strategic Studies under the President of the Republic of Abkhazia in the conference hall of the hotel "Atrium Victoria".

News_Titles: The Foreign Minister of Abkhazia held a meeting with representatives of the group of participants of the Geneva International Discussions on Security and Stability in Transcaucasia from the European Union
News_Shorts: On November 10, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia hosted a regular meeting with the representatives of a group of participants of the International Geneva Discussions on Security and Stability in Transcaucasia from the European Union Bjorn Kuene and Martha Freeman.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Co-chairman of the Geneva discussions Anti Turunen and Senior Political Adviser to the UN Special Representative to the Geneva discussions Hailu Mamo
News_Shorts: On November 10, the Abkhaz Foreign Ministry hosted a working meeting between the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove with the Co-chairman of the Geneva discussions on security and stability in Transcaucasia from the UN Anti Turunen and Senior Political Adviser to the UN Special Representative to the Geneva discussions Hailu Mamo.

News_Titles: On the meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic Abkhazia Daur Kove with the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Syrian Arab Republic to the Russian Federation Riad Haddad
News_Shorts: The Embassy of the Syrian Arab Republic to the Russian Federation hosted a meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia with the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Syrian Arab Republic to the Russian Federation Riad Haddad.

News_Titles: On the meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic Abkhazia Daur Kove with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation Sergey Lavrov
News_Shorts: The meeting between the Heads of Foreign Ministries of Abkhazia and Russia Daur Kove and Sergey Lavrov was held in Moscow, in which was discussed a wide range of issues of cooperation between two countries.

News_Titles: The delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia arrived in Moscow
News_Shorts: Abkhazian Foreign Ministry delegation led by the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Abkhazia Daur Kove, arrived in Moscow for a working visit.

News_Titles: On the meeting with the representatives of "World Vision" program in Abkhazia
News_Shorts:
On October 25 the Abkhaz Foreign Ministry hosted a meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove with the Abkhazia Program Manager of "World Vision" Alfred Nurdja, as well as with the Director of the "World Vision" South Caucasus National Director Hans Bederski. The meeting was also attended by the Head of the Department of Europe, the United States and Canada Artur Gaguliya.

Representatives of "World Vision" told the Minister about various projects implemented by the organization and provided the annual report on activities of the program in the Republic of Abkhazia.

"World Vision" is present in Abkhazia since 2005. This organization provides educational, agricultural and other projects. The projects are aimed at addressing a variety of social and environmental issues. The organization covers all the areas of the Republic of Abkhazia.

News_Titles: On the meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove with the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation in the Republic of Abkhazia Semyon Grigoryev
News_Shorts: On October 17, the Abkhazian Foreign Minister Daur Kove met with Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation in the Republic of Abkhazia Semyon Grigoriev.

News_Titles: Meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove with the delegation of the Federation of Abkhazian cultural centers in Turkey
News_Shorts: On October 12, the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia hosted a meeting between the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove with the delegation of the Federation of Abkhazian cultural centers in Turkey headed by the chairman Ahmet Hapat. The meeting was also attended by the Head of the Committee for Repatriation Vadim Kharazia and the Head of the Department of Turkey and Middle East Inver Alshundba.

News_Titles: On the meeting at the Foreign Ministry of Abkhazia
News_Shorts: On October 7, the Abkhaz Foreign Ministry hosted a meeting of the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia Daur Kove with the delegation of the Republic of Afghanistan, arrived for participation in the MMA tournament "OFS-9", which took place in Sukhum on the sixth of October.

News_Titles: Daur Kove met with Vladimir Nekrasov, the Trade Representative of Russia in Abkhazia.
News_Shorts: Daur Kove, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia met with Vladimir Nekrasov, the Trade Representative of the Russian Federation in the Republic of Abkhazia in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Abkhazia.
